text: The men's 60 metres hurdles event at the 1984 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 4 March.Results (p. 497) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Romuald Giegiel '''' |György Bakos '''' |Jiří Hudec '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 from each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
